content: When we run the bundle for Test 2a Update message, which is to change Cause of Death, through Canary using the Update message, we are receiving an error that the new causes of death are not what Canary expects. Canary is expecting the original values before the update. Test2a_Update_Error.png
Hi @Ed Flaherty, Canary only has the base test cases built in and doesn't currently have tests for the updated values in Test 2a or Test 2b.
@Pete Krautscheid Okay, great. Thank you. So, I would guess we can disregard running the two update tests through Canary then?
@Ed Flaherty That's certainly fine; you can also continue to use Canary with the expectation that you will have specific errors just for the changed fields.
